name: ABugInTheSystem
description:
Crawl through an abandoned spaceship and discover what lies dormant inside... Overview

ABugInTheSystem is an experimental game meant to invoke a somber and bleak atmosphere through cinematic gameplay sections and naturalistic dialog.  

Game Controls  ⌨️ Keyboard: 
  • WASD to Move;
  • Space-bar to Fly;
  • Left or Right Shift to Grasp;
🎮 Controller:
  • Left Joystick to Move;
  • [A] button to Fly;
  • Left or Right Trigger to Grasp;

I recommend you play this game using a controller and headphones, if possible.

How to Install

Simply download the .zip file, extract the contents to a folder and run the executable!

Thank you for playing!

Thanks for checking out the project, I hope to keep working on it in the future!

Also, make sure to take a look at the included document to see an overview of the project's development process accompanied by some neat gifs (.html version only). If you have any feedback or issues feel free to leave it in a comment below. 😊

This project was developed as my submission to SFAS21, the 2021 Grads in Games "Search For a Star" Competition.
